name: Rana The Hunter
description:
Hello all, this is my first game "Rana the hunter", developed in just 3 days. Instructions are in game. please try and give reviews. It is possible that this game has some bugs. I planning to make a free 3D version of this game. Where our player can ride the dragons or can play has a dragon. Please donate if you wish. Thank you.

For fellow developers, if you want source code of the game, you can buy it for $10. I am willing to share the code with all. Thank You.
